name: Project Microgame 1.5
description:
Your are the same guy you play in Project Microgame 1 (the test bot)

but you created an paradox and you got into another dimension (other version of mars) and the level is made in other way.

HAVE FUN :)

for thoose who think the game window is too small, dowlnload Magpie (.NET 6.0 for desktop apps required) 

how to use Magpie:just open the game, open Magpie set the hotkey you like for fullscreen and then get back to the game press the hotkey and then...BOOM!

The game is fullscreen! (it will look low quality because the FPS Microgame i use is made to be a web game and not an dowlnloadable game)
